[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/complaints_handler.c

This handler deals with complaints. It manages posting to the "complaints" board and numbering the posts sequentially (helps to follow threads if anybody follows up the posts on the board).

See also:
/std/room/inherit/complaints_room.c and /std/room/complaints_room.c

Written by Arienne

Started Wed Apr 4 14:11:50 BST 2001

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/board.h

Method index

do_submit_complaint(string)
Submits a complaint to the complaints board anonymously.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_submit_complaint
int do_submit_complaint(string str)
Submits a complaint to the complaints board anonymously.

Parameters:
str - The text of the complaint.
Returns:
The note number, or 0 on failure.
